channel.title: Block/Ignore Function
channel.description:
Sometimes I'll get into a game with people who have a sense of humor I don't like, that I don't want to be matched with anymore
It'd be nice to be able to block these people and be prevented from matchmaking with them in the near future.
I don't think these people deserve reports every time.
Sometimes it's younger kids who think spamming "FUCK YEAH PICKLE RICK" is funny. More power to them, I just don't want to play with them anymore.

item.title: Block/Ignore Function
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
Ummm, well… I understand your concern, but I do not think TOL has enough players to do that. I mean you could report them, but I would not know how would that work.

Read full topic
